pkg.name: icon
pkg.title: Icon
pkg.description: The Agriculture Design System supports the use of meaningful and universal system icons that users understand. The icon component is used to apply our set of universal icons to more complex components of the system.

scope.title: Icon
scope.description: The Agriculture Design System supports the use of meaningful and universal system icons that users understand. The icon component is used to apply our set of universal icons to more complex components of the system.

relatedComponents.name: app-layout
relatedComponents.title: App layout
relatedComponents.description: The app layout provides a consistent way for users to navigate around a web application and access their account settings.

relatedComponents.name: button
relatedComponents.title: Button
relatedComponents.description: A button communicates an action to a user and indicates what will happen next.

relatedComponents.name: progress-indicator
relatedComponents.title: Progress indicator
relatedComponents.description: Progress indicators show users the number of steps in a task, where they are up to in the process and how much is left to do.

relatedComponents.name: status-badge
relatedComponents.title: Status badge
relatedComponents.description: Status badges are visual indicators used to highlight an item’s status for quick recognition.

relatedComponents.name: task-list
relatedComponents.title: Task list
relatedComponents.description: Task list is a navigation tool that show users what input is required to complete a task or transaction.
